text: Ma sha Allah (also mashallah) is an Islamic phrase that expresses appreciation, joy, praise, or thankfulness. Mashallah or ma sha Allah may also refer to: ==People== *Mashallah ibn Athari (c.740–815), Persian astronomer *Mashallah Shamsolvaezin, Iranian journalist *Mashalla Akhmedov (born 1959), Azerbaijani footballer ==Other== *Mashaallah (horse) ==See also== *Inshallah (disambiguation) Category:Arabic masculine given names
title: Mashallah (disambiguation)
